pages.text: Hidden ores are one thing, but what are these? A variety of faintly shimmering flowers in stunning hues dot the landscape that I don't remember seeing before. Surely they're of importance. I should gather some specimens for examination.

pages.title: Mystical Flowers
pages.text: On closer inspection, their vibrantly-colored petals teem with magic, waiting to be used.$(br2)  This strange book that appeared in my hands might provide the knowledge I need to tap into that magic.
